message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.CG

Reasoning: The paper presents a new local approximation algorithm for computing Maximum a Posteriori (MAP) and log-partition function for arbitrary exponential family distribution represented by a finite-valued pair-wise Markov random field (MRF). This involves techniques from artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG) for inference in MRFs. The algorithm also involves message-passing implementation (cs.IT) and self-avoiding walk of graph (cs.CG). The paper also discusses computational complexity and bounds (cs.DS).
